On Friday , Wall Street Journal columnist Kimberly Strassel argued that President Trump ’s lawyers [V: are] n’t handling the Robert Mueller investigation the right way . The lawyers are all focused on his personal liability , and not on how the Mueller probe threatens the separation of powers . She recommended a dramatic course of declassifying all the documents underlying the Mueller
